name: Credit Digital
slogan: Credit Digital is a point of sale loan platform
description: CreditDigital are the leading payment solution for B2B vendors in the UK. Our platform allows you to offer your business customers, an instant finance instalment option at checkout and in-store. You get paid in full & upfront- cost and risk free to you.

team.name: Daniel Lipinski
team.bioHtml: CEO & Founder- Strong commercial acumen, with a passion for achieving results in emerging markets.

jobs.title: Sales Executive Credit Digital
jobs.description:
About Credit Digital


Credit Digital is a point-of-sale loan platform for retail businesses, allowing them to offer a variety of finance/ repayment options to their customers.

We partner with leading lenders to allow businesses to offer their customers the greatest choice and best rates for their product/ service purchase.

We are VC-funded and our entrepreneurial management team has previously exited a number of companies for £60m +.

This is a great opportunity to join the business at a time when you can really make the role your own and influence the direction of the business in a large untapped market.



The Role

We are looking for an experienced and entrepreneurial Sales people, who will form a pivotal part of the product strategy and roadmap for Credit Digital.

You will work closely with the CEO and Head Of Product day to day to help shape the future of our products: both App and Web.


Key responsibilities include:

- Helping to create and manage our sales pipeline
- Closing inbound and outbound leads via phone and email
- Managing and recording interactions in CRM system (HubSpot)
- Manage and train the sales team
- Thinking strategically about how to improve sales pitch and process



You will have experience:

- Proven experience and a track record of success in B2B sales, taking leads from discovery to close on the phone
- Confidence in selling an innovative SaaS product, providing both online demos
- Experience in B2B enterprise sales would be a great advantage, as would experience selling into similar target roles, sectors and international territories
- Working in a sales team in a start-up (ideally tech/SaaS based)
- 5+ years sales experience
- Working with a CRM system



Benefits:

- Uncapped Commission on sales- should as a minimum double your basic
- Opportunity for rapid career growth within fast growing company
- Pension
- Regular team lunches and trips
- Working with a fun, smart team

jobs.title: Senior Full Stack Engineer
jobs.description:
Key points:

We are changing the way businesses raise money. No cap-tables. No pitch decks. No coffee.

We are launching a new product and looking for a very hands on engineer to lead the way.

Its a greenfield opportunity so you get to choose how things get done, the technologies and autonomy with approach.

Get to market fast, we are a startup with a small but senior team and do not like over engineering (so if you like to build for building sake then this is not for you).


What's the opportunity?

We're looking for an experienced Senior Full Stack Software Engineer to help us support the way businesses, do business. You will be joining a very product focused team and will lead the development process throughout the product development cycle - from new ideas all the way to implementations. If you’re passionate about the craft and process of building an exciting product from the ground up and working with great people, you’ll fit right in.

Who are we?

CreditDigital is a well funded start up, building the future of revenue finance. We help businesses get access to growth capital fast and repay via a revenue share model without having to put their home on the line or loose equity. A true partnership. 

We integrate with a suite of live data points, so we can create an unfiltered view of a businesses performance- as and when it happens.


What will you be doing?

As a senior engineer, you will have the opportunity to set up the standards in how the development process works. As a product focused team, we trust each individual to be autonomous and work towards are shared goals. We are fully committed in supporting one another in any way possible.

•	Act as a champion that drives product ideas from start to completion: from research insights, to workflows all the way to visual front end.
•	Prototype ideas to quickly access viability, we don’t need anything perfect.
•	Iterate based on feedback from the whole team.
•	Work closely with the product team to ship ideas.

What skills and experience do I need?

•	Ruby (Rails 6) , React (Redux) 
•	An appreciation of the entire product development process, from problem solving through to front end.
•	The ability to quickly built MVPs
•	Excellent communicator that can articulate the thought behind proposals.
•	Able to collaborate with the risk team and the wider company on strategy and delivery.
•	Frontend: our design system is built with Ruby, JavaScript and Sass CSS
•	Infrastructure: Heroku, AWS

Where will I be working from?

Normally you will be working from our WeWork, Old Street Offices but we are a remote friendly bunch so you can adjust your schedule as you see fit.

What would I be paid?

Our pay is within the top 10% of the industry, for the matched role and experience, based on London rates. 

Salary is not everything. Our benefits are all aimed at supporting a life well lived away from work. We don't offer free beers or Coke on tap but rather:

•	25 days off per annum plus bank holidays.
•	35 hours / week. Normal working hours are between 10am – 6pm.
•	Work from home whenever. If you prefer to come to the office everyday that’s great, if you prefer to work from home 4 times a week that’s fantastic. Whatever works for you. As a team we will make sure you are not missing out by pushing remote first practices. Flexibility to adjust your daily hours. Visiting friends and family in another country, going to the bank or the gym, you only need to have an overlap between our core hours (12am – 4pm) for 6 hours. As an example, you can start at 8am and finish at 4pm or 12am and finish at 8pm.
